oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Manejo del suelo de una plantación de cítricos en reconversión ecológica: estrategias y cambios a corto plazo
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albiach, R.
Pérez-Piqueres, A.
Domínguez, A.
Pomares, A.
Canet, R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil biology
Composting and manuring
Fruit and berries
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Preliminary results of a full field trial for controlling citrus orchard decline within BIO-INCROP (Core organic 2) project are reported. IVIA evaluated several low-input options in pre-plant for conversion to organic of a multigeneration citrus orchard. Soil chemical and biological parameters in response to five treatments are analyzed and discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Albiach, R.; Pérez-Piqueres, A.; Domínguez, A.; Pomares, A. and Canet, R. (2013) Manejo del suelo de una plantación de cítricos en reconversión ecológica: estrategias y cambios a corto plazo. [Soil management of a citrus orchard in convertion to organic: strategies and changes in the medium term.] AE, 2013 (14), pp. 18-19.
